#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int Testcases;
	cin>>Testcases;
	for(int Case = 1;Case<=Testcases;Case++)
	{
		int N;
		cin>>N;
		if((N&(N-1))==0)
		{
			for(int i = 31;i>=0;i--)
			{
				if((1<<i)&N)
				{
					cout<<i-1<<endl;
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			std::vector<int> V;
			for(int i = 31;i>=0;i--)
			{
				if((1<<i)&N)
					V.push_back(i);
			}
			int Ans = 1e9;	
			int reqones = V.size();
			int diff = V[0] - V[1];
			for(int i = 1;i<=reqones-1;i++)
			{
				Ans = min(Ans,max(V[0] + i - 1,V[i] - 1 + reqones-i));
			}
			cout<<Ans<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
